description: Numbers that are the sum of 4 but no fewer positive cubes.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
mathematica: Select[Range[300], (pr = PowersRepresentations[#, 4, 3]; pr != {} && Count[pr, r_/; (Times @@ r) == 0] == 0)&] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jul 26 2011 *)
